title: Floral Zircon Jhumka Earrings
materials: Base metal alloy (believed to be gold plated); Zircon stones in various colors.
features: Floral motif, delicate gemstone setting, mixed color palette. The jhumka design offers a modern twist with its floral arrangement and zircon detailing. Likely features a secure push-back closure for comfort and ease of wear. There is a scroll design on the top portion of the earring.
colors: and blue zircon stones. The base metal appears silver.
occasions: adding a touch of elegance to any outfit.
description: Combines classic Indian design with modern aesthetics; The multiple colored stones make these jhumkas match with a variety of outfits; Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.
